website_summaries.verdict: Clean lines on this easy to assemble glider.
pros: Back is made from a UV resistant material
cons: Designed to support only 400 pounds, which might be a little lightweight for some adult pairs

customer_reviews.title: Bleeds Rust!!
customer_reviews.text: This “bleeds” liquid rust. It is not designed well if it rains as water gets in the inside and literally drops of rust start coming out. After a rain storm a stream of rust was coming out so I tipped it over and it poured out liquid rust. Now I keep it under cover on my patio. I would return it but too much of a hassle as I would have to disassemble it, package it and pay for shipping. So disappointed in this product as this is a major defect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rusty
customer_reviews.text: We've had this rocker for just over a month and were very pleased with the assembly and product overall. Stepping outside today I noticed the rusty water leaking out of the swing. Major bummer! Not sure how long this product will last at this rate.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Mesh gives us the coolness we need in south Texas weather!
customer_reviews.text: Relatively easy for my son to put together. Very comfortable. Glides smoothly with no noise. Sturdy while still being nice looking. Only had about a month and delighted so far. I relocated to south Texas and had been looking in stores for patio furniture for a year. Could not find a glider which was both comfortable and had provision for air circulation in the seat. (Cushions and solid surfaces have you sweating in short order in 100 degree weather. And, yes, I do sit outside in the shade with a fan in that weather😎) Finally read reviews on this item and bought sight unseen and sitting untried. Very happy with decision and product! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the clean lines. Fairly easy to put together alone. On my covered deck, it went through 50 MPH winds yesterday without moving except for the seat just gentle rocking back and forth. You can't say that about many pieces of outdoor furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Lee P.

customer_reviews.title: Great value - love the product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured and expected .. easy to assemble, sturdy, and functional. With so many similar choices I was a bit anxious but choose a best seller - glad I did and would recommend to others as well. Would have liked a few color choices - but the dark gray will fit in well as a neutral option.
customer_reviews.author: Terry - Connecticut

customer_reviews.title: Great swing
customer_reviews.text: I love this swing! It is very comfortable and very attractive. It came on time just as promised. I did have to hire somebody to put it together, I could not have done it myself. I would have given it five stars but just one day after use as I was swinging it started to squeak. I leave my oil can nearby which always fixes the problem 👍
customer_reviews.author: sue Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Nice !!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful glider,need 2 people to put together, directions are confusing, but make sure you put the swing part once together down on ground than set step 1 and 2 that you put together over top than you can attach it, I was confused on this step from directions, once husband got home he knew what to do...glides smoothly and looks beautiful
customer_reviews.author: J.Meuer

customer_reviews.title: Rusty water always trapped inside!
customer_reviews.text: It says outdoor glider but it gets water trapped inside and completely ruins anything near it! I would only recommend for a screened porch or something!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy J

customer_reviews.title: Rusting inside the frame.
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful but has been rusting after only one month. After every rain, orange rust liquid spews out of the sides. It gets on the glider and if someone sits on it, it will ruin their clothing.
customer_reviews.author: deniser

customer_reviews.title: Forget the instructions...Go back to the Ad..
customer_reviews.text: OK, this college grad was feeling like a frustrated fool trying to follow the enclosed directions. I was doing OK until Step Two, then the cursing started. The "A-HA" moment came when I looked back at the Amazon ad....and there was a picture of the side-sliding connections. I used a close-up picture of that, and everything started to make sense...20 minutes later, it was assembled....'Very comfortable, and seems pretty solid....will work great for my new porch. (One more hint...If you set the swing seat and back on another seat-with-a-back, it sets at about the right height, and one person can easily put it together.)
customer_reviews.author: jonesjunk

customer_reviews.title: Quality, Value, Inferior Assembly Steps
customer_reviews.text: The glider bench itself is of very good quality and value. What prevented me from using a 5-star rating are the installation steps, instructions, and illustrations. The illustrations are very minimal, small, not very clear. Also, in the parts package were many flat washers which were not referenced in the parts list no assembly steps / illustrations. We placed the glider on our screened porch and have been thoroughly enjoying the us of it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M.

customer_reviews.title: Instructions on how to assemble.not very clear.
customer_reviews.text: Not to bad for the price. It’s smaller then I expected it very high. It looks nice and seems well made. Places it on front pouch will see how well it holds out. Was not to bad putting it together but the instructions were not good. No words and pictures you had to look over several times to determine how thing go. I order two by accident so one is going back.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge L. Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Smooth
customer_reviews.text: I found the glider easy to assemble EXCEPT for one glitch. It took me about one hour to assemble and I took my time to put the screws in place before tightening any of them. The exception to the easy assembly was there was a through hole that was not round and after I figured that out I had to use a drill to clear it. The glider is very smooth and definitely comfortable. I am leaving it outside and we will see how it does with the winter rains.
customer_reviews.author: Millie Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Parts were bent/rusts easily
customer_reviews.text: I am really good at assembling things. This bench was quite challenging. The support for the seat was bent so the screws did not line up properly. I had to force it together and ended up scratching the side of the bench. It is completely rusting after 1 month. If you decide to buy this, get a cover. My patio is all stained from the rust that has come off of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jon W.

customer_reviews.title: Easy Glider
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a great product, barely a week old. All parts were there and seemed like good stuff for the money paid. Works great and feels great to sit on. About the directions.. Pay very close attention to all pictures and or graphics for proper orientation of parts. Read and interpret any written instructions that are given. There really aren't that many parts but you need to get it right. If you are not mechanically inclined..get someone that is.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: and was assembled easily and works and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it, received it on time, and was assembled easily and works and looks great. This product quality is much better than the one I had that was purchased at LOWES.....
customer_reviews.author: carlos delapaz

customer_reviews.title: If you can DIY it a little, you can make it work.
customer_reviews.text: This glider would be easy to assemble - BUT 2 of the metal pieces were bent in such a way that they would not reach the bolt they were supposed to connect to. I had to use a hammer to beat them into the right shape so they could be bolted together. Then I was able to assemble it and it worked ok. Quality control is awful, especially because this glider was expensive. but I made it work and I do like the glider.
customer_reviews.author: eeeblack

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair for the Price and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The chair is a great price and also really comfortable. It had one section that rusted slightly but the seller offered a price reduction to make it right. The piece that rusted is also easy to repaint with a little sanding and spray paint.
customer_reviews.author: Brennerd24

customer_reviews.title: Missing hardware
customer_reviews.text: I would like to be more enthusiastic about this glider. But the outer box was damaged and the hardware packet had broken. Several important nuts were missing and weren't readily available where I live. The instructions are not very clear. The glider is a nice small size and looks nice on my porch.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I love this glider! My husband had a difficult time putting one of the bottom pieces on but other than that it was a breeze he said . My step father and mother sat on it and one of the screws bent but it came with extra screws so that’s fixed. I think maybe they exceeded the weight limit possibly . But other than that it’s a great swing!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: I have had the glider now for two months and am perfectly satisfied with it. I put it together on my own (I am a woman over sixty years old) with no help from anyone and following less-than-perfect instructions. It took me about an hour to do so. The glider is definitely sturdy and of very good construction. Note: you must oil the moving parts or they will squeak! It also looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Zee Lugo

customer_reviews.title: The instructions are really awful
customer_reviews.text: I am slowly assembling this glider. The instructions are just ridiculous ... there's no mention of the nuts and washers contained (the nuts are essential) . You just have to figure it out. Hoping the glider itself is ok....
customer_reviews.author: Debbi from MD

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter, we had a high chair that was always in the way and she actually prefers being at the table with everyone else, closer than a high chair. If you take the tray off, she can sit right up to the table, strapped in, of course. Also when I am working in the kitchen, I will move the chair in the kitchen so she can see what I am doing and she plays with lots of things on the tray. I highly recommend it! Also when she is not at my house, I can push this up to the table with the other chairs. I have had compliments on how cute and convenient it is.
customer_reviews.author: Candee

customer_reviews.title: Can't really go wrong for the price.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it was a solid buy. It looks nice, works perfectly, and is decently comfortable. My one recommendation is that the assembly was easier. Not all of the pieces fit together properly and some didn't allign that well. Instructions could be considered a bit confusing, but as far as the product goes, it fit all my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Campbell the Halo FanTop Contributor: Lego

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great but not that Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The title basically says it all. This is a nice looking glide chair at a reasonable price, but there is very little lower back support. Admittedly, I had 4 back surgeries so I'm particularly sensitive to this. Other members of my household did not complain.
customer_reviews.author: Hillel Kaminsky

customer_reviews.title: the instructions were clear and I thought I was in for an easy build. After awhile I enlisted the help of ...
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the appearance of the glider parts upon opening the box. Everything was there, the instructions were clear and I thought I was in for an easy build. After awhile I enlisted the help of others and we ended up returning the glider as it could not be built. Something did not fit and we were unable to complete the task.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this swinging bench for a small balcony at home and it fits perfectly in the space. It's super comfortable to sit in. The only negative I have noticed so far is that there is already a bit of rust on it. I'm hoping it holds up long term. The cost is certainly worth it though and they do make a cover which I may also invest in. Overall I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Hatch

customer_reviews.title: Assembly is worth the trouble
customer_reviews.text: As with anything you assemble yourself, it's tedious. My only assembly experience is with Ikea or similar products - i.e. I am not highly skilled in carpentry! I was able to put this together by myself, but a buddy would have been handy for balancing pieces together. The end result is a handsome and comfy glider. Very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: RainyRed

customer_reviews.title: Swings sweet but really boring without pillows.
customer_reviews.text: We are really enjoying our rocker. It’s been about a week since we put it together and both really like it. Definitely get some pillows for it. Cause it’s pretty bland.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Assembly a Mess
customer_reviews.text: Holes didn’t line up, and pretty challenging to put together otherwise. I’d recommend spending more money on a more reliable, come-exactly-as-needed product
customer_reviews.author: Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Ordered this by mistake
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this by mistake, but decided to keep it after I took a peek in the box. Very sturdy but also very comfortable. Only had it a couple of months and it stays under the patio so I'm not sure how well it will hold up under the elements. But very impressed with the quality and the price.
customer_reviews.author: TRex

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love this Swing Glider and it fits on my front porch just perfect. It is so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Nans Newport

customer_reviews.title: the holes in the seat/backrest assembly do not line up
customer_reviews.text: We received the order quicker that was promised which was good. And it looks great. However, the holes in the seat and backrest do not align. Thus, the screws that would attach them to the arms of the glider cannot be inserted. The manufacturer has no phone number to call, only an email. I'm going to have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my glider!
customer_reviews.text: This glider is great on our patio. My daughter put it together for me (I would have had trouble, but she likes puzzles). It can hold two large adults with no trouble, glides easily and is sturdy. Good quality. I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Intentional Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Decent for a cheap, outdoor glider
customer_reviews.text: The construction is iffy but seems sturdy for now. It rests back from the legs, kinda offset and makes getting on and off the seat a bit tricky. It sits comfortably and glides nice. I would recommend it but make sure you set it on a patio or pavers.
customer_reviews.author: OldTestament

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this glider swing for the backyard. It is just what we were looking for. Our 12 year old granddaughter helped her Pop pop put it together and was the first one to swing on it. Purchased an outdoor pillow to go with it that reads Hello Summer!! What a great addition to our yard. Thank you for a wonderful product. Mimi
customer_reviews.author: mimi

customer_reviews.title: It's just ok
customer_reviews.text: This glider is very comfortable but the bolts keep coming off, even with the plastic covers on them. A few times a year I have to go around and tighten them up.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain gal

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoying this glider. Assembly was pretty easy. Instructions were not very clear and the print was small making it difficult to discern the pictures, so if you’ve never assembled a piece of furniture it may be more difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Tamika

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but use REAL tools for assembly
customer_reviews.text: Instructions slightly off, 'A', 'B' ..etc. etc. Did not jive with actual components, but with a little figuring it all came together. Some parts needed muscled into position, eventually coming together as detailed. Helper dog NOT INCLUDED,... but highly recommended. Helper cats are completely unreliable!!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Conehead

customer_reviews.title: Superjare Outdoor Swing Glider Chair
customer_reviews.text: Took 1.5 hours to assemble. Some steps in instruction are confusing. One bolt didn't really fit. After 2 days of use, started creaking - I used WD40.
customer_reviews.author: RZ

customer_reviews.title: Nice swing
customer_reviews.text: Love this swing. Bought for my grandma and she likes it just sits to low to the ground for her. The color is nice and it swings good . Just need to be taller.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Get some pillows
customer_reviews.text: This is a yard bench for me and my wife. It's a little uncomfortable for long time sitting but that's with no pillows. Very sturdy and durable. It rocks smoothly. I'm glad I found it it's well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Assembled it by myself in about 50 minutes. Went very smoothly. Looks great, glides very nicely. Not sure I would put 2- 220 lb people on it, but I love the look of it.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Someone to assemble it
customer_reviews.text: Not being able to assemble it I requested to have it assembled when I bought it but was not charged the service and my glider is still unasembled I need someone to assemble it my hisbanf and I are in our late seventies and eighties and not able to do it. Please help I will pay for the service.
customer_reviews.author: melba rose collins

customer_reviews.title: great purchase for the price
customer_reviews.text: First of all, assembly you MUST have 2 people to assemble. Putting the legs together wasn't a real issue, however, putting the seat in place was NOT easy. We love this glider and it is super comfy to sit on and enjoy nature. I would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: becky wimmer

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and I got a firepit to go with it and we really enjoy sitting outside by the fire. Easy to put together, too!
customer_reviews.author: K-path doc

customer_reviews.title: Simple set-up
customer_reviews.text: This was not as difficult to assemble as other reviewers said. Take your time with a friend and it goes together fairly easily. The size is perfect for the space we had. It is on a screened in porch so hopefully that will extend its life.
customer_reviews.author: Working Mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for porch
customer_reviews.text: Not the easiest assembly, but worth it! Durable and awesome for the porch! Even the cats like it
customer_reviews.author: sheshana n mahmood

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for smaller areas.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. It is well constructed and fairly easy to put together. It was packaged very carefully to ensure a safe arrival without damage. It did take three people to assemble, just to hold steady.
customer_reviews.author: candydawg

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: All parts included, went together quickly. Since it is not aluminum and we are in Florida, I bought a cover to protect it during rainy weather. Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: samsara

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Very comfortable and was easy to put ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Very comfortable and was easy to put together all by myself. Directions could have been a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Momof five

customer_reviews.title: This chair will rust
customer_reviews.text: Within a couple weeks this chair left rust spots on my deck.
customer_reviews.author: CGChristian

customer_reviews.title: Contemporary glider
customer_reviews.text: The product seems to be high quality- the hardware is packaged in easy to understand labeled packaging with extra bolts and plastic acorn nut caps. Very easy to assemble and can do it with one person in about 30 minutes. I plan on buying a cushion but it isn’t required to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J.

customer_reviews.title: Well built for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were a little confusing, but got it together without too much trouble. Sits comfortably enough although, not much glide to it.
customer_reviews.author: bjl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Outdoor Seating
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are simple and clear, making set up fast and easy (although an extra set of hands is extremely helpful). It's just the right size for two, comfortable, and will look great on your porch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Aficionado

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs a porch glider
customer_reviews.text: Had to have someone put this together. Very comfortable and popular.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Crain

customer_reviews.title: Assembly instructions are horrible.
customer_reviews.text: Did our best to put it together in spite of what has to be the single worst set of instructions I have ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn M. Nies

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Good value and sturdy, instructions not so great and hubby had to drill a hole as one was not where it was supposed to be. Sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Betsy S.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. Assembly was a piece of cake; did it by myself. Everything is organized and ready to go. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: rgreen

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: My father uses the chair every day. He loves it
customer_reviews.author: Janie Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: misleading directions
customer_reviews.text: GLIDERBENCH VERSION : 1.5-1910 IF YOU PUT THE SEAT ON WITH "A and B" double bars at the back then use that to reference the back of the seat, the seat will be on backwards. I had to loosen the armrest connectors and turn the whole seat around so that the doublebar is in front not the back Ben
customer_reviews.author: ben

customer_reviews.title: Great little glider
customer_reviews.text: Great glider. Good size for my small screened-in porch. Somewhat awkward assembly for one person, but not impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Great glider
customer_reviews.text: It just poured here and I love how the rain just goes through and dries quickly! Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Martino

customer_reviews.title: Would buy a second
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together holds a lot of weight I am 175 my husband 250 we can both sit together.
customer_reviews.author: Mypointsonmypointofview

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing !!! Gave it to my mom for mother’s day and she loves it! Great size and product. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: btfoltz

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product. Well constructed and rather simple to assemble. Pillows are a good addition. I have mine on the balcony to watch the ocean. Very relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: RPaul

customer_reviews.title: I love this swing glider
customer_reviews.text: I love this swing glider! It was fairly easy to assemble, although it would have been easier with a second person. It seems very durable and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: mlrakas

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly,great price
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty rad to put together and just perfect for our front porch. We couldn’t use one with a canopy so we decided on this and are very happy with our choice.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Eliason

customer_reviews.title: For Skinny, Short People Only
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this glider is top notch and was easy to put together. But, it is very low to the ground and the length of the seats are narrow. There is no wiggle room when two average size adults are sitting on it and my husband, who is just over 6 feet tall, had his knees nearly up to his chest.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable bench glider. We had an issue with a part rusting after a year of being stored outside. Customer service was wonderful and replaced the parts for free! We are now getting a waterproof cover to protect it in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry M. Lampart

customer_reviews.title: Nice glider for the price !
customer_reviews.text: Received it today,15 minutes later we were sitting in it. It’s nice and quiet. Hope that continues with use. Looks really nice with the rest of our patio furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette F.

customer_reviews.title: Nice glider!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice glider. Pretty easy to assemble but pay attention to the instructions. Looks really nice. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The look is terrific and don't have to worry about cushions
customer_reviews.author: dakrumms

customer_reviews.title: Swing Glider
customer_reviews.text: Assemble was easy, a two person job (especially when adding the seat and back. Assemble time under one hour. The swing is confortable and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: CAL

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Just put it together. Appears to be quality. Let’s see how it holds up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Richard F Mayszak

customer_reviews.title: the instructions were next to useless.
customer_reviews.text: the glider lived up to expectations, the instructions were next to useless.
customer_reviews.author: rick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Glider
customer_reviews.text: What a beauty and easy to assemble. It is on my lanai and I added two pillows. It is very elegant
customer_reviews.author: C. Ann Scott

customer_reviews.title: Went together easily. Very comfortable to sit in and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Went together easily. Very comfortable to sit in and looks nice. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: This glider is perfect for us
customer_reviews.text: This glider is perfect for us. It was so easy to put together. I didn't have one problem😁 The price was great and it is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie M. Webb

customer_reviews.title: It's comfortable and light weight
customer_reviews.text: This glider is well worth the cost. It's comfortable and light weight. Not real hard to put together, but really look at the pictures closely for placing the right section for assembly
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this and fairly easy to assemble. Great price
customer_reviews.author: David Peaslee

customer_reviews.title: Nice glider, easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Nice glider, easy to put together, EXCEPT when it came time to attach the last screw to the seat corner the holes did not align.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Estrada

customer_reviews.title: ... less than one hour to assemble and was as good if not better than expected
customer_reviews.text: took less than one hour to assemble and was as good if not better than expected. Wife loves it.....Happy wife, happy life :)!
customer_reviews.author: Gary S.

customer_reviews.title: We love this! We put it on our front porch ...
customer_reviews.text: We love this! We put it on our front porch and have been using it every night. I love the bottom bar that you can use as a footstool if you have short legs. We got two pillows for the side. The only thing is the bar in the back can sometimes hit your butt / tailbone if you don't all the way back. I wish we could get a pad for that. It would also be great to have a pad for some neck support but overall, very comfy and nice to swing on. No noise at all. Assembly was a little hard with one person but went much faster with 2. Took about an hour to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Ash Harden

customer_reviews.title: A nice addition to our front porch
customer_reviews.text: It took 45 minutes or so for my husband and I to put this together. It looks nice and is comfortable to sit on. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great when finally put together!
customer_reviews.text: Great when put together! But we had to use a clamp to actually get everything together enough to put the bolts in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Glider is great! Well made and sturdy. However, directions could use some improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy, one person assembly
customer_reviews.text: Love this glider!!! Easy to assemble and easy to keep clean.!!!! Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Silverfox

customer_reviews.title: Glide
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this glider very much. It's durable and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Krishay Hollowell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product well built, but please inform buyer that it takes 2 individuals to put it together !
customer_reviews.author: Salvatore Morra

customer_reviews.title: Love it! It was so easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It was so easy to assemble. Very comfortable and glides wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I like the glider but needed a professional to assemble it.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Josephs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy. We’ll see how it lasts but it’s comfortable and nice looking. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Marybeth L.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love it. II put it outside on my patio. Its a perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl linn

customer_reviews.title: Great glider - comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great glider - comfortable, simplistic , yet looks good. I had one and liked it so much, I bought another.
customer_reviews.author: Bill S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my balcony.
customer_reviews.text: I love both benches and rocking chairs. This is the perfect combination. It is sturdy, comfortable, and well designed.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This item was sent in great condition. True to size and love the color. Very bright and warm!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great buy// great packaging./ put together in 30 min. / very cute for two people
customer_reviews.author: Connie Souders

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy to put together and looks good
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace an old 2-person swing that is finally falling apart - the gliding action is nice, but of course not as great or as freely moving as a swing. It was easy for 2 people to put together with clear instructions and they provide one extra of nuts and bolts which is a nice touch. It looks good, a dark grey, and is comfortable to sit and glide upon.
customer_reviews.author: Jane S

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: We just got it and so far we like it.
customer_reviews.author: Malka Feldman

product_meta.title: Superjare Outdoor Swing Glider Chair, Patio Bench for 2 Person, Garden Loveseat, Rocking Seating - Gray
feature_bullets: A GREAT SWING CHAIR - Size: 48.5''L x 28''W x 34.2''H. Enough space to contain 2 people! Extra thickened metal frame ensures the swing chair’s longevity! The load bearing of the bench is up to 440lbs, which allows you to sit away without worrying! UPDATE：We updated the product instruction in 2020 to provide better customer service

IT FEARS NEITHER AGE NOR HEAT - The airy mesh provides excellent ventilation during the summer months! The powder coating surface will protect metal frame from damp air! With high tensile strength textilene material, the glider chair will company your family for long time! PLUS, we custom-made a cover for this swing chair, resistant against high temperatures and time. Please search B078N65GWG

ENJOY DREAMY GENTLE SWINGING - Sit down comfortably and feel the smooth of the glider, ergonomic backward and forward motion of this exquisite chair. No rough rocking back and forth; just a soft gliding like a breeze; the perfect gift for you, your significant other, or your loved ones

KICK BACK & ENJOY THE MOMENT - There is no better way to blow off some steam after a tiring day, than getting a nice cup of coffee or cocoa, along with your favorite magazine or book, and sitting comfortably on your new patio rocking chair. Children and adults, men and women, every member of your family, and your friends; don’t be surprised if they start taking turns on it

THE PERFECT ADDITION TO YOUR GARDEN, BALCONY, OR PATIO - If you want a final touch to your gorgeous garden, backyard, balcony, or patio, this fantastic glider seat will do the trick. Additional, it’s not just a decorative addition to look at, but rather a useful piece of furniture that both you and your guests will be fond of
